rels.__comment__: Link ClientComputer to User based on DuoUser-DuoPhone relationship
rels.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(:DuoUser)-[:HAS_DUO_PHONE]-(:DuoPhone)<-[:HAS_OBSERVATION]-(d:ClientComputer) MERGE (u)-[r:OWNS]->(d) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = timestamp() SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG

rels.__comment__: Link ClientComputer to User based on DuoUser-DuoEndpoint relationship
rels.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(:DuoUser)-[:HAS_DUO_ENDPOINT]-(:DuoEndpoint)<-[:HAS_OBSERVATION]-(d:ClientComputer) MERGE (u)-[r:OWNS]->(d) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = timestamp() SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG

rels.__comment__: Link ClientComputer to User based on SnipeitUser-SnipeitAsset relationship
rels.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(:SnipeitUser)-[:HAS_CHECKED_OUT]-(:SnipeitAsset)<-[:HAS_OBSERVATION]-(d:ClientComputer) MERGE (u)-[r:OWNS]->(d) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = timestamp() SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG

rels.__comment__: Link ClientComputer to User based on TailscaleUser-TailscaleDevice relationship
rels.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(:TailscaleUser)-[:OWNS]-(:TailscaleDevice)<-[:HAS_OBSERVATION]-(d:ClientComputer) MERGE (u)-[r:OWNS]->(d) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = timestamp() SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG
